text: DeAntoine Beasley (born January 8, 1979 in Atlanta, Georgia) is a retired American professional basketball player and current assistant coach for Gardner–Webb.http://www.gwusports.com/coaches.aspx?rc=90&path;=mbball He also played for the Plymouth Raiders in the British Basketball League. The 6 ft 7 small forward attended Tennessee Tech, and signed with the Raiders in 2002. After his retirement, he returned to Tennessee Tech as an assistant coach. == References == Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:American expatriate basketball people in the United Kingdom Category:Basketball players from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:British Basketball League players Category:Sportspeople from Atlanta Category:Plymouth Raiders players Category:Small forwards Category:Tennessee Tech Golden Eagles men's basketball coaches Category:Tennessee Tech Golden Eagles men's basketball players Category:American men's basketball players
title: DeAntoine Beasley
